repo_notes.content: There is no web GUI, the reference in the wiki should be removed.

pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce the CKAN MCP Server system, explaining its purpose as a Model Context Protocol server that enables AI agents to interact with 500+ CKAN open data portals worldwide through natural language and structured queries

pages.title: Key Features
pages.purpose: Highlight the main capabilities: 15+ CKAN tools, dual runtime support, MCP Resource Templates, and global edge deployment

pages.title: Architecture Overview
pages.purpose: Provide a high-level architectural diagram showing the two-tier system: MCP Server Core and CKAN Portals, plus the dual deployment model

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.purpose: Guide users through the fastest path to using the system based on their needs and technical expertise

pages.title: Claude Desktop Setup
pages.purpose: Configure Claude Desktop to use the MCP server via stdio (local) or HTTP (remote/Workers) transport modes

pages.title: Installation Options
pages.purpose: Compare the three deployment options: npm global install, Cloudflare Workers, and self-hosted HTTP server

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Deep dive into the system architecture, component relationships, and design decisions

pages.title: System Components
pages.purpose: Explain the modular architecture: entry points, transport layer, server core, tool handlers, resource templates, and utilities

pages.title: MCP Server Core
pages.purpose: Explain the MCP server implementation: tool registration system, request routing, Zod validation, and error handling

pages.title: Transport Layer
pages.purpose: Document the three transport modes: stdio (12 lines), HTTP (27 lines), and Cloudflare Workers WebStandardStreamable, explaining how the same tools run across different runtimes

pages.title: Tool Layer
pages.purpose: Describe the tool implementation pattern: Zod schemas, handler functions, makeCkanRequest abstraction, and output formatting (1,465+ lines of business logic)

pages.title: Dual Runtime Design
pages.purpose: Explain how the same codebase runs on Node.js and Cloudflare Workers V8 isolates, including build targets, bundle sizes, and runtime differences

pages.title: User Guides
pages.purpose: Practical guides for end users interacting with CKAN data through the system

pages.title: Querying CKAN Data
pages.purpose: Guide to common CKAN queries: searching datasets, exploring organizations, querying DataStore, using facets, and understanding Solr syntax

pages.title: Advanced Search Techniques
pages.purpose: Document Solr query syntax: fuzzy search (~N), proximity search ("phrase"~N), boosting (^N), range queries, date math, wildcards, and boolean operators

pages.title: DataStore Queries
pages.purpose: Explain DataStore functionality: basic key-value filtering, SQL queries, field selection, sorting, pagination, and the 32,000 record limit

pages.title: Working with Organizations
pages.purpose: Guide to organization tools: listing with package counts, searching by pattern, retrieving details, and understanding organizational hierarchies

pages.title: Tool Reference
pages.purpose: Complete reference documentation for all 15+ MCP tools with parameters, return types, and usage examples

pages.title: Dataset Tools
pages.purpose: Document ckan_package_search, ckan_find_relevant_datasets, ckan_package_show, ckan_package_list with detailed parameter descriptions and examples

pages.title: Organization Tools
pages.purpose: Document ckan_organization_list, ckan_organization_show, ckan_organization_search with sorting, pagination, and filtering options

pages.title: DataStore Tools
pages.purpose: Document ckan_datastore_search and ckan_datastore_search_sql with filtering syntax, SQL query examples, and limit constraints

pages.title: Metadata Tools
pages.purpose: Document ckan_tag_list, ckan_group_list, ckan_group_show, ckan_group_search, and ckan_status_show for portal exploration

pages.title: MCP Resource Templates
pages.purpose: Explain the ckan:// URI scheme for accessing datasets, resources, and organizations via MCP Resource Templates

pages.title: Developer Guide
pages.purpose: Guide for developers who want to modify, extend, or contribute to the codebase

pages.title: Project Structure
pages.purpose: Document the codebase organization: src/ structure, tool modules (1,465+ lines), utilities (138+ lines), resources (50+ lines), and test organization (2,340 lines)

pages.title: Adding New Tools
pages.purpose: Step-by-step guide to implementing a new MCP tool: defining Zod schemas, creating handlers, using makeCkanRequest, formatting outputs, and registering with the server

pages.title: Utility Functions
pages.purpose: Document the utility layer: makeCkanRequest (51 lines, 98.59% coverage), formatting functions (37 lines, 98% coverage), query resolution, and URL generation
